comment.body:
I think our time / attention / content is much more valuable, than we think. 
Facebook, twitter, etc... just puts a tax on it by providing the platform and technically selling our data to companies (adverts), which is makes the actual product (milk, television, etc..) more expensive. So you are paying for adverts anyways.

Zeronet and similiar networks trying to show a different way. IMHO :)
